page.title: 05DORMANSTOWN WORKSHOP
page.content: The workshop provides work for ninety_one trainees learning a variety of trades.plus full time work for fourteen adults on the staff. There are many kinds of training schemes and this particular scheme lasts for a period of twelve months. The workshop provides training in a variety of trades among which are engineering,construction,administratio n,craft and design,catering and computers.The workshop has six computers for the last course and regulary changes the make of the computers to keep up with changes in computing. All the trainees have to work thirty_seven hours a week and have three weeks holiday a year.
